# 动画库

http://tympanus.net/Development/ItemTransitions/index2.html http://tympanus.net/Development/PageTransitions/ https://github.com/daneden/animate.css

# loading 旋转

@keyframes rotating{
from{transform:rotate(0)}
to{transform:rotate(360deg)}
}

animation:rotating 1.2s linear infinite
